mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_test(tno, WRITER, title, content) VALUES (seq_test_tno.nextval, 'ADMIN',#{title},#{content})
mapper.select: select rno, tno, writer, title, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE from (select ROWNUM rno, tno, writer, title, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE from (SELECt tno, writer, title, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM TBL_TEST ORDER BY REGDATE DESC)) where rno>=(#{page}-1)*10 AND rno<#{page}*10
